page.title: 20HAUTES CAPELLES JNR.SCHOOL
page.content: This part of the Domesday project was undertaken by 2nd. yr. students at the Hautes Capelles Junior School in Guernsey,and a class of top Infants totalling 98 children, 5 members of staff (Mrs.J.Harris, Mrs.E.Collas ,Mrs.Wood,Mrs.G.Barrasin & Mr. P.de Bertrand),together with the supportive help of many of the children's parents. We spent three mornings in the area of our project collecting information relating to the land cover, and amenities, and then went on group visits to various places of interest. Using the Domesday Project as a starting point we produced a booklet of the area for each child, and undertook various other areas of work such as model making, drawing, interviewing,writing, and painting.
